name: Glasslyn
description:
Glasslyn is an RPG Maker game, developed using only base assets and currently only being developed by one person.

This game is VERY early-in-development, there is currently very little story, and only has content up to level 5.

Please note that levelling too far past level 5 at this time will cause future updates - including added skills - to not be added to your characters.

At the moment, the windows copy of the game is 1 version behind the android version, due to a mistake I made. This will be fixed soon! At the moment, please do not recruit the character that requires you to find a secret, as a bug will cause you to noclip.
